name: roar-of-time
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.
flavor_text.platinum: The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.
